javelin.model.spell

Class Summon

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.upgrade.Upgrade
      • javelin.controller.upgrade.Spell
        • javelin.model.spell.Summon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Summon
extends Spell
    Brings an ally to fight with your team. Upper Krust's method is not followed here since it makes no sense for a Gelugon (CR21) that could summon another Gelugon to be CR21.4. More discussion on #ratechallenge(int, String, float). TODO This should not be a Spell. See cast(Combatant, Combatant, BattleState, boolean)
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
